name: elaine
description:
This is elaine! A minimalistic tile-matching action game by Slight Super Powers. Frantically guiding your player tile around a sensile platform to match the incoming pattern in time. In this deceptively simple game, you'll have to deal with a shifting screen, multi-colored patterns of increasing speed and complexity, and an unrelenting countdown timer synced to brain-pumping music.Features:
  • six uniquely challenging levels
  • highly addictive gameplay
  • pulsing electronic soundtrack
  • minimalistic game design
  • obsessive global leaderboards
  • accurate pantone color reproduction
  • non-stop action
